name: 0x10 - Automation
description:
The tenth class focuses on automating attacks with malware.
After starting the class:
  • Connect to your lab with ssh root@172.20.0.125 and 'admin' password
  • The class starts also IRC Server (172.20.0.130) and 2 bots (172.20.0.131, 172.20.0.132). The bots have an SSH server running with 'root:admin' credentials.
